eventslides.caption: Our flexible Ballroom has floor-to-ceiling windows to create a generous space filled with natural light, easily accommodating groups up to 490. For smaller meetings, the Boardroom, Breakout Room, Library and Art Gallery offer a variety of opportunities for creative gatherings or breakout sessions. The expansive Event Lawn offers a unique open air venue where the sky really is the limit on what you and our team can create.

groundslides.caption: Located on eleven scenic acres in Mountain View and boasting over 15,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space, we offer planners endless opportunities to create memorable meeting experiences.
